==about:config firefox==
source: https://proprivacy.com/vpn/guides/firefox-privacy-security-guide


		=about:config=
	==Privacy optimized Setting==


+=======================================================================+
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| about:config privacy optimized setting firefox               |        |
+--------------------------------------------------------------+--------+
| browser.safebrowsing.phishing.enabled*                       | false  |
| browser.safebrowsing.malware.enabled*                        | false  |
| dom.event.clipboardevents.enabled*                           | false  |
| dom.storage.enabled*                                         | false  |
| geo.enabled*                                                 | false  |
| network.http.sendSecureXSiteReferrer*                        | false  |
| network.prefetch-next* false                                 | false  |
| privacy.donottrackheader.enabled* true                       | true   |
| privacy.donottrackheader.value*                              | true   |
| browser.privatebrowsing.autostart true                       | true   |
| browser.startup.homepage   ///home/batan/file                | string |
| browser.startup.page :0=blank 1=                             | 0      |
| datareporting.healthreport.uploadEnabled   =false            | false  |
| geo.wifi.uri		add 127.0.0.1                          | string |
| media.peerconnection.enabled                                 | true   |
| network.cookie.cookieBehavior	1 from server                  | 1      |
| network.cookie.lifetimePolicy	2 end of session               | 2      |
| network.dns.disablePrefetch                                  | false  |
| network.http.sendRefererHeader                               | false  |
| privacy.donottrackheader.value*                              | true   |
| privacy.trackingprotection.enabled true                      | true   |
| toolkit.telemetry.enabled false                              | false  |
|                                                              |        |
+==============================================================+========+
+==============================================================+========+

*In firefox the privacy.query_stripping.enabled.pbmode should be set to true*
